00035 /* If this source file built with example, the LPC17xx FW library configuration
00036  * file in each example directory ("lpc17xx_libcfg.h") must be included,

00050 static LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *GPIO_GetPointer(uint8_t portNum);
00051 static GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *FIO_HalfWordGetPointer(uint8_t portNum);
00052 static GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *FIO_ByteGetPointer(uint8_t portNum);

00054 /*********************************************************************/
00059 static LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *GPIO_GetPointer(uint8_t portNum)
00060 {
00061         LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *pGPIO = NULL;
00062 
00063         switch (portNum) {
00064         case 0:
00065                 pGPIO = LPC_GPIO0;
00066                 break;
00067         case 1:
00068                 pGPIO = LPC_GPIO1;
00069                 break;
00070         case 2:
00071                 pGPIO = LPC_GPIO2;
00072                 break;
00073         case 3:
00074                 pGPIO = LPC_GPIO3;
00075                 break;
00076         case 4:
00077                 pGPIO = LPC_GPIO4;
00078                 break;
00079         default:
00080                 break;
00081         }
00082 
00083         return pGPIO;
00084 }
00085 
00086 /*********************************************************************/
00092 static GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *FIO_HalfWordGetPointer(uint8_t portNum)
00093 {
00094         GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *pFIO = NULL;
00095 
00096         switch (portNum) {
00097         case 0:
00098                 pFIO = GPIO0_HalfWord;
00099                 break;
00100         case 1:
00101                 pFIO = GPIO1_HalfWord;
00102                 break;
00103         case 2:
00104                 pFIO = GPIO2_HalfWord;
00105                 break;
00106         case 3:
00107                 pFIO = GPIO3_HalfWord;
00108                 break;
00109         case 4:
00110                 pFIO = GPIO4_HalfWord;
00111                 break;
00112         default:
00113                 break;
00114         }
00115 
00116         return pFIO;
00117 }

00125 static GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *FIO_ByteGetPointer(uint8_t portNum)
00126 {
00127         GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *pFIO = NULL;
00128 
00129         switch (portNum) {
00130         case 0:
00131                 pFIO = GPIO0_Byte;
00132                 break;
00133         case 1:
00134                 pFIO = GPIO1_Byte;
00135                 break;
00136         case 2:
00137                 pFIO = GPIO2_Byte;
00138                 break;
00139         case 3:
00140                 pFIO = GPIO3_Byte;
00141                 break;
00142         case 4:
00143                 pFIO = GPIO4_Byte;
00144                 break;
00145         default:
00146                 break;
00147         }
00148 
00149         return pFIO;
00150 }

00161 /* GPIO ------------------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00162 
00163 /*********************************************************************/
00177 void GPIO_SetDir(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t bitValue, uint8_t dir)
00178 {
00179         LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *pGPIO = GPIO_GetPointer(portNum);
00180 
00181         if (pGPIO != NULL) {
00182                 // Enable Output
00183                 if (dir) {
00184                         pGPIO->FIODIR |= bitValue;
00185                 }
00186                 // Enable Input
00187                 else {
00188                         pGPIO->FIODIR &= ~bitValue;
00189                 }
00190         }
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 /*********************************************************************/
00208 void GPIO_SetValue(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t bitValue)
00209 {
00210         LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *pGPIO = GPIO_GetPointer(portNum);
00211 
00212         if (pGPIO != NULL) {
00213                 pGPIO->FIOSET = bitValue;
00214         }
00215 }
00216 
00217 /*********************************************************************/
00231 void GPIO_ClearValue(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t bitValue)
00232 {
00233         LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *pGPIO = GPIO_GetPointer(portNum);
00234 
00235         if (pGPIO != NULL) {
00236                 pGPIO->FIOCLR = bitValue;
00237         }
00238 }

00240 /*********************************************************************/
00248 uint32_t GPIO_ReadValue(uint8_t portNum)
00249 {
00250         LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *pGPIO = GPIO_GetPointer(portNum);
00251 
00252         if (pGPIO != NULL) {
00253                 return pGPIO->FIOPIN;
00254         }
00255 
00256         return (0);
00257 }
00258 
00259 /*********************************************************************/
00269 void GPIO_IntCmd(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t bitValue, uint8_t edgeState)
00270 {
00271         if((portNum == 0)&&(edgeState == 0))
00272                 LPC_GPIOINT->IO0IntEnR = bitValue;
00273         else if ((portNum == 2)&&(edgeState == 0))
00274                 LPC_GPIOINT->IO2IntEnR = bitValue;
00275         else if ((portNum == 0)&&(edgeState == 1))
00276                 LPC_GPIOINT->IO0IntEnF = bitValue;
00277         else if ((portNum == 2)&&(edgeState == 1))
00278                 LPC_GPIOINT->IO2IntEnF = bitValue;
00279         else
00280                 //Error
00281                 while(1);
00282 }
00283 
00284 /*********************************************************************/
00297 FunctionalState GPIO_GetIntStatus(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t pinNum, uint8_t edgeState)
00298 {
00299         if((portNum == 0) && (edgeState == 0))//Rising Edge
00300                 return ((FunctionalState)(((LPC_GPIOINT->IO0IntStatR)>>pinNum)& 0x1));
00301         else if ((portNum == 2) && (edgeState == 0))
00302                 return ((FunctionalState)(((LPC_GPIOINT->IO2IntStatR)>>pinNum)& 0x1));
00303         else if ((portNum == 0) && (edgeState == 1))//Falling Edge
00304                 return ((FunctionalState)(((LPC_GPIOINT->IO0IntStatF)>>pinNum)& 0x1));
00305         else if ((portNum == 2) && (edgeState == 1))
00306                 return ((FunctionalState)(((LPC_GPIOINT->IO2IntStatF)>>pinNum)& 0x1));
00307         else
00308                 //Error
00309                 while(1);
00310 }
00311 /*********************************************************************/
00318 void GPIO_ClearInt(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t bitValue)
00319 {
00320         if(portNum == 0)
00321                 LPC_GPIOINT->IO0IntClr = bitValue;
00322         else if (portNum == 2)
00323                 LPC_GPIOINT->IO2IntClr = bitValue;
00324         else
00325                 //Invalid portNum
00326                 while(1);
00327 }

00387 /*********************************************************************/
00405 void FIO_SetMask(uint8_t portNum, uint32_t bitValue, uint8_t maskValue)
00406 {
00407         LPC_GPIO_TypeDef *pFIO = GPIO_GetPointer(portNum);
00408         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00409                 // Mask
00410                 if (maskValue){
00411                         pFIO->FIOMASK |= bitValue;
00412                 }
00413                 // Un-mask
00414                 else {
00415                         pFIO->FIOMASK &= ~bitValue;
00416                 }
00417         }
00418 }

00423 /*********************************************************************/
00437 void FIO_HalfWordSetDir(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t halfwordNum, uint16_t bitValue, uint8_t dir)
00438 {
00439         GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_HalfWordGetPointer(portNum);
00440         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00441                 // Output direction
00442                 if (dir) {
00443                         // Upper
00444                         if(halfwordNum) {
00445                                 pFIO->FIODIRU |= bitValue;
00446                         }
00447                         // lower
00448                         else {
00449                                 pFIO->FIODIRL |= bitValue;
00450                         }
00451                 }
00452                 // Input direction
00453                 else {
00454                         // Upper
00455                         if(halfwordNum) {
00456                                 pFIO->FIODIRU &= ~bitValue;
00457                         }
00458                         // lower
00459                         else {
00460                                 pFIO->FIODIRL &= ~bitValue;
00461                         }
00462                 }
00463         }
00464 }
00465 
00466 
00467 /*********************************************************************/
00486 void FIO_HalfWordSetMask(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t halfwordNum, uint16_t bitValue, uint8_t maskValue)
00487 {
00488         GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_HalfWordGetPointer(portNum);
00489         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00490                 // Mask
00491                 if (maskValue){
00492                         // Upper
00493                         if(halfwordNum) {
00494                                 pFIO->FIOMASKU |= bitValue;
00495                         }
00496                         // lower
00497                         else {
00498                                 pFIO->FIOMASKL |= bitValue;
00499                         }
00500                 }
00501                 // Un-mask
00502                 else {
00503                         // Upper
00504                         if(halfwordNum) {
00505                                 pFIO->FIOMASKU &= ~bitValue;
00506                         }
00507                         // lower
00508                         else {
00509                                 pFIO->FIOMASKL &= ~bitValue;
00510                         }
00511                 }
00512         }
00513 }

00560 void FIO_HalfWordClearValue(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t halfwordNum, uint16_t bitValue)
00561 {
00562         GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_HalfWordGetPointer(portNum);
00563         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00564                 // Upper
00565                 if(halfwordNum) {
00566                         pFIO->FIOCLRU = bitValue;

00576 /*********************************************************************/
00585 uint16_t FIO_HalfWordReadValue(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t halfwordNum)
00586 {
00587         GPIO_HalfWord_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_HalfWordGetPointer(portNum);
00588         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00589                 // Upper
00590                 if(halfwordNum) {
00591                         return (pFIO->FIOPINU);
00592                 }
00593                 // lower
00594                 else {
00595                         return (pFIO->FIOPINL);
00596                 }
00597         }
00598         return (0);
00599 }

00602 /* FIO Byte accessible ------------------------------------------------------------ */
00603 
00604 /*********************************************************************/
00618 void FIO_ByteSetDir(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t byteNum, uint8_t bitValue, uint8_t dir)
00619 {
00620         GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_ByteGetPointer(portNum);
00621         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00622                 // Output direction
00623                 if (dir) {
00624                         if (byteNum <= 3) {
00625                                 pFIO->FIODIR[byteNum] |= bitValue;
00626                         }
00627                 }
00628                 // Input direction
00629                 else {
00630                         if (byteNum <= 3) {
00631                                 pFIO->FIODIR[byteNum] &= ~bitValue;
00632                         }
00633                 }
00634         }
00635 }
00636 
00637 /*********************************************************************/
00656 void FIO_ByteSetMask(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t byteNum, uint8_t bitValue, uint8_t maskValue)
00657 {
00658         GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_ByteGetPointer(portNum);
00659         if(pFIO != NULL) {
00660                 // Mask
00661                 if (maskValue) {
00662                         if (byteNum <= 3) {
00663                                 pFIO->FIOMASK[byteNum] |= bitValue;
00664                         }
00665                 }
00666                 // Un-mask
00667                 else {
00668                         if (byteNum <= 3) {
00669                                 pFIO->FIOMASK[byteNum] &= ~bitValue;
00670                         }
00671                 }
00672         }
00673 }

00676 /*********************************************************************/
00690 void FIO_ByteSetValue(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t byteNum, uint8_t bitValue)
00691 {
00692         GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_ByteGetPointer(portNum);
00693         if (pFIO != NULL) {
00694                 if (byteNum <= 3){
00695                         pFIO->FIOSET[byteNum] = bitValue;
00696                 }
00697         }

00716 {
00717         GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_ByteGetPointer(portNum);
00718         if (pFIO != NULL) {
00719                 if (byteNum <= 3){
00720                         pFIO->FIOCLR[byteNum] = bitValue;

00726 /*********************************************************************/
00735 uint8_t FIO_ByteReadValue(uint8_t portNum, uint8_t byteNum)
00736 {
00737         GPIO_Byte_TypeDef *pFIO = FIO_ByteGetPointer(portNum);
00738         if (pFIO != NULL) {
00739                 if (byteNum <= 3){
00740                         return (pFIO->FIOPIN[byteNum]);
00741                 }
00742         }
00743         return (0);
00744 }
